thread.title: Paul Mac

author: Paul Mac
title: Paul Mac
text: I had spent a couple of months going to different dealerships looking to get a good deal on a family car. I had been looking to secure a good deal on a nearly new car but found the local dealers not budging on prices that other websites stated they were valued at. I had seen Carwow but was unsure, I gave it a go and found that it worked a treat and managed to secure a deal on a new car at a better price than the nearly new ones. Glad a gave it ago and will definitely use it again.
